description: Make a dazzling grand entrance in this best-selling Cubic Zirconia tennis bracelet by Mariell. With gleaming marquise-cut cz gems each meticulously pronged, this stunning Genuine Silver Platinum plated statement bracelet is the perfect jewelry choice for every special occasion. We have completely fallen for this bracelet's versatile "dress up" or "dress down" styling. At 7" long, this bridal bracelet abounds with a double row of the finest quality CZ stones in a size to fit most wristst. Each gemstone is cut with the same precision used on Genuine diamonds to give you the look of fine jewelry at a fraction of the price. It's classic styling will coordinate with hundreds of accessories in the Mariell Designs collection. Our gorgeous formal or wedding bracelet is also a top-seller for mothers of the bride, bridesmaids, holiday parties, proms, homecoming, Christmas gifts or any time you need an impressive, elegant gift. After your special occasion frocks are neatly tucked back in the closet, slip on this sophisticated Genuine rhodium bracelet with your business attire or everyday wardrobe to add a fabulous splash of sparkle.
